The verisure_alarm.conf can be used on the sample files.

The bitstream looks scrambled and most likely has two 10 byte
payloads. Part of the alarm system you can connect different
sensors. One door contact switch only had a transmitter part.
A PIR sensor had the CC1101 chip which might indicate that some
devices also might listen for commands from the base station.

#55fff d87e08023c005e1b3e2ed 54000 387e17fdc3ffbe04c1d13
#55fff d87e08023c005e1b3e2ed 54000 387e17fdc3ffbe04c1d13
#55fff d87e08023c005e1b3e2ed 54000 387e17fdc3ffbe04c1d13
#55fff d87e08023c005e1b3e2ed 54000 387e17fdc3ffbe04c1d13
#55fff d87e08023c005e1b3e2ed 54000 387e17fdc3ffbe04c1d13

The following are examples of bitstreams from alarms sensors:

87e08023c005e1b3e2ed54000387e17fdc3ffbe04c1d1355fffd87e080
87e08023c005e0cdeae754000387e17fdc3ffbe0cc151955fffd8
87e08023c005e1b3e2ed54000387e17fdc3ffbe04c1d1355fffd87e080
87e08023c005e1b3e2ed54000387e17fdc3ffbe04c1d1355fffd87e08023
87e08023c005e1b3e2ed54000387e17fdc3ffbe04c1d1355fffd87e0802
87e08023c005e0cdeae754000387e17fdc3ffbe0cc151955fffd87e08023c005e


Door switch, BU = botton up
[DS][Closed][BU]87e08023c005e1b3e2ed54000387e17fdc3ffbe04c1d1355fffd87e08023c005e1b3e2ed5
[DS][Open  ][BU]87e08023c005e0cdeae754000387e17fdc3ffbe0cc15
[DS][Closed][BD]87e08023c005e1f376c554000387e17fdc3ffbe00c893b55fffd87e08023c
[DS][Open  ][BD]87e08023c005e1737f3154000387e17fdc3ffbe08c80cf55fffd87
                8722c4985a0e34b822fbf354000386dd3b665bf1ca


8722c4985a0e36b83311f355fffd8722c4985a0e36b83311
8722c4985a0e36383ae5f354000386dd3b665bf037c63ae5f355
8722c4985a0e36383ae5f354000386dd3b665bf037c63ae5f355
8722c4985a0e34b822fbf354000386dd3b665bf1ca
